summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 63rd Ave. South from Waters Ave. South to Renton Ave. South; and certain other streets, avenues, alleys and an easement; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 17590 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
